artifacts.summary: Audited TruthLemma sorries, created forward-only exports, documented all 4 sorries as TRUSTED/OMEGA-RULE with architectural justifications
Clean forward-only truth lemma export with comprehensive sorry status documentation
Documentation archive explaining backward direction limitations

completion_data.completion_summary: Audited 4 TruthLemma.lean sorries and documented them as TRUSTED (Box cases - architectural S5 limitation) or OMEGA-RULE (temporal backward cases - infinitary derivation). Created TruthLemmaForward.lean for clean completeness proof imports and archived backward direction documentation. All completeness theorems remain sorry-free.
